noUselessCatch.description:
Description

Disallow unnecessarycatchclauses.
Acatchclause that only rethrows the original error is redundant,
and has no effect on the runtime behavior of the program.
These redundant clauses can be a source of confusion and code bloat,
so itâ€™s better to disallow these unnecessarycatchclauses.
noUselessCatch.option: This rule has no specific options.
